duties_responsibilities.duty: Scheduling service appointments and obtaining customer and vehicle data prior to arrival when possible.
Selling additional needed service to customers and provides a complete and accurate written cost estimate for labor and parts.
Establishing "promised time" and checking on progress of repair throughout the day.
Contacting customers regarding any changes in the estimate or promise time and explaining cost and time requirements in detail.
Test-driving the vehicle or referring to the test technician as necessary.
Maintaining Customer Satisfaction Index rating and advising customers on the care of their cars and the value of maintaining their vehicles.
Maintaining a dealership-prescribed standard for “hours per customer repair order written" and understanding and following federal, state, and local regulations.
Following all company safety policies and procedures, and immediately reporting any and all accidents to a manager or supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or the equivalent
